metadata.title: CVE-2023-43376 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in /hoteldruid/clienti.php ofHoteldruid v3.0.5 allows attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTMLvia a crafted payload injected into the nometipotariffa1 parameter.

criterions.comment: hoteldruid package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
